All entrées served with steamed rice.
Brown rice add 75¢.

  • E8. Red Curry

  • E9. Green Curry
    Choice of meat or seafood in green curry with coconut milk, bamboo, carrots, onions, bell peppers and basil leaves.
  • E10. Panang Curry
    Panang curry paste slowly simmered in creamy coconut milk with bell peppers, lime leaves, and chioce of meat or seafood.
  • E11. Massamun Curry
    Choice of meat or seafood cooked in massamun curry with coconut milk, onions, potatoes and peanuts.

  • For following dishes, choose vegetable $9, chicken $9, beef $10, shrimp $11, seafood $13.

  • E12. Pad Ped Curry
    Spicy curry paste sautéed with carrots, bell peppers, bamboo, basil leaves, lime leaves, with your choice of meat or seafood.
  • E13. Basil
    Chili garlic sauce wiht fresh basil leaves, onions, carrots and bell pepers, and choice of meat or seafood
  • E14. Ginger
    Choice of meat or seafood stir-fried with fresh ginger, onions, scallions and black mushrooms in soy bean sauce.
  • E15. Sweet & Sour
    Choice of meat or seafood sautéd with tomatoes, pineapples, cucumbers and onions.
